trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SEQ_00<tab>Jemime would have you reaffirm your desire to join the Goldsmiths' Guild.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SEQ_01<tab>The receptionist bids you present yourself to Serendipity, the young lady in charge of the guild. Seek her out and show her your burning desire to become a goldsmith.

TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SEQ_02<tab>Mistress Serendipity eagerly accepts you into the fold, and gifts you with a weathered chaser hammer. With the new tool of your trade in hand, speak to your guildmaster once more to begin your journey as a goldsmith.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Mistress Serendipity.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_JEMIME_000_1<tab>Before you can embark upon your journey to become a goldsmith, you must first seek an audience with our guildmaster. Are you ready to do so?
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_JEMIME_000_2<tab>You shall find Mistress Serendipity on the workshop floor, just down the steps.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_JEMIME_000_3<tab>Show her your burning desire to learn, and you are certain to receive her permission to join.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_JEMIME_000_4<tab>Nervous, are we? I find slow, deep breaths calm the nerves. See if that works for you, and let me know when you are ready to meet the guildmaster.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_5<tab>Stop right there, you little troublemaker! People are working here!
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_6<tab>Oh! Pardon me, I had you mistaken for a mammet. For a moment there I─
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_7<tab><sigh> Let's start over, shall we? What brings you here today, adventurer? Do you perchance have aspirations to become a goldsmith?
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_A1_000_1<tab>Have you aspirations to become a goldsmith?
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_Q1_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_Q1_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_8<tab>Sorry, sorry. My mistake, it's been a long day. I don't ordinarily mind visitors, but I'm afraid I'm very busy at the moment. If you would excuse me...
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_9<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Really<var 1A 01 /var>!?
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_10<tab>That's great! Welcome, <var 1A 02 /var>welcome<var 1A 01 /var>! I'm Serendipity, but you can call me Sera.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_11<tab>Or is that too informal?

TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_12<tab>Sorry, I'm still unaccustomed to this whole “guildmaster” business... Ah, right! What did you say your name was again? <var 08 E905 ((Adrian)) ((Apollo)) /var>?

TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_13<tab>Oh, right─<var 29 EB02 /var>! Well then, <var 29 EB02 /var>! Work hard and one day your creations may line the shelves at Eshtaime's Aesthetics. Trust in yourself and you can achieve anything!
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_14<tab>That was sufficiently inspiring, I trust?
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_15<tab>Good! Next order of business: here is your new chaser hammer. Well...I say “new,” but it's actually a bit weathered.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SERENDIPITY_000_16<tab>But never you mind that! Just show me that you know how to hold it so we can get started.
TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SYSTEM_000_20<tab>You have unlocked a new class! You can change to this class at any time by equipping the weapon received from this quest.

TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SYSTEM_000_21<tab>When changing classes, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between classes instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.

TEXT_CLSGLD011_00608_SYSTEM_000_22<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
